titles.title: Christ From Whom All Blessings Flow (easy nice

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ from whom all blessings flow Perfecting the saints below Hear us who Thy nature share Who Thy mystic body are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Join us in one spirit join Let us still receive of Thine Still for more on Thee we call Thou who fillest all in all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Move and actuate and guide Diverse gifts to each divide Place according to Thy will Let us all our work fulfill{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweetly may we all agree Touched with softest sympathy Kindly for each other care Every member feel its share{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Never from Thy service move Needful to each other prove Use the grace on each bestowed Tempered by the art of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Many are we now and one We who Jesus have put on There is neither bond nor free Male nor female Lord in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love like death hath all destroyed Rendered all distinctions void Names and sects and parties fall Thou O Christ art all in all{/lang-eng}
